title: Check us out! We offer washers and dryers in all of our apartments!
posting_body: ['The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments', 'Located at: 483 Scott Blvd Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 1 bath | 925 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $2170/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', 'Inside your apartment, you will enjoy high-quality features like gas fireplaces, 9-foot ceilings, walk-in closets, an attached balcony/patio, and plenty of storage space.', 'Many of our apartments even include an in-home washer and dryer!', 'Also, our community is pet-friendly with a limit of 2 pets per apartment.', 'Visit our amenities page to see what you can look forward to when you make the move to The Bluffs at Castle Rock.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '✓ BBQ and Picnic Area', '✓ Coffee Bar', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Lounge', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Resident Business Center', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Sprinkler System', '✓ Storage Space', '✓ 5 minutes from Target, Home Depot and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets', '✓ Bark Park and Dog Run Area', '✓ Game Room with Shuffleboard', '✓ Next to Castle Rock Community Center', '✓ On-Site Management and Maintenance', '✓ Outdoor Lounge with Fire Pit', '✓ Short-term Lease Available', '✓ Sparkling Pool/Spa', '✓ State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '✓ Walk to Rock Park & Hiking Trails', 'Apartment Features!', '✓ Air Conditioning/Heating', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Kitchen', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Window Coverings', '✓ Accent Color Walls', '✓ Double Pane Windows', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Newly Renovated', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Private Entrances', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In Select Homes', '✓ Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floors', '✓ Washer/Dryer', '✓ Water, Sewer & Trash Included', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet, pet rent per month.', '$300 non-refundable pet fee; $300 pet deposit per pet will be collected.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DAFD664D313B447']
